p: Naringenin (NAR; ≥ 98% purity) was purchased from Santa Cruz Biotechnology (Dallas, TX, USA), prepared in a 50 mM stock solution in dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO, Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA) and then diluted to its final concentrations in DMEM/F-12 supplemented with 100 IU/µg/mL penicillin/streptomycin and 10% FBS (Thermo Fisher Scientific, Grand Island, New York, USA).
